item.description:
The GBSC was born 4 years ago on December 6th 2006!

We will celebrate over brunch at the Marriott hotel in Newton. Their Breakfast buffet runs till Noon and is priced from $12 - $17. You can see the menu here

The GBSC will be picking up the tip.

Weather is expected to be in the 40's. If you ride, (which I hope you do) dress in layers with emphasis on keeping your core and legs very warm. There will be a ride after brunch on back roads throughout Weston, Lincoln, Concord, Acton, & Sudbury with a stop for hot chocolate somewhere along the way. Ride speed will be 30-40 Mph & paced so one one gets left behind.

I hope to see you on 2, 3 or 4 wheels of any size or description.

Paul
item.name: 4th Anniv Brunch for the GBSC
